directions: In a large bowl, whisk together all ingredients until well mixed.  Spray a 9-inch pie plate with cooking spray and fill with the spinach mixture.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until browned and set. Let cool for 20 minutes, cut in wedges and serve.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed thoroughly to remove liquid
1/2 cup finely chopped scallions with some green tops
1 pinch Salt and pepper, to taste
title: Spinach and Mushroom Frittata
